name: Observations Oblique
description:
Observations Oblique- a small game about the difficulties maintaining eye contact while having a conversation.  The theme this year was Circuitous, which can mean "indirect". 

Instructions: 

Move the mouse to balance looking at your speaking partner's eyes (which loses spoons but keeps your partner happy), with looking at their face or away (which regains spoons but might make your partner upset if you look away too long). 

This game was made during Train Jam 2019 by Team Train Milk. 🚂🥛

Credits:
